revised_title: Inhibitor Effects on Succinic Dehydrogenase and Reconstitution of the Succinic Dehydrogenase-Cytochrome System
tldr: The authors studied the effects of inhibitors on the activity of soluble succinic dehydrogenase and the reconstitution of the succinic dehydrogenase-cytochrome system. They found that pyrophosphate, narcotics, and cyanide have different effects on the system, and cyanide's irreversible effect prevents the reconstitution of the particulate succinic oxidase system.
